author: Miles Budnek
releaseNotes:
Changelog:
  * 1.1 - Initial Release
  * 1.2 - Fix thermostat mode and setpoint reverting to default on hub reboot
  * 1.3 - Fix issue with manual override
  * 1.4 - Fix issues when controlling switches
  * 1.5 - Fix errors when a child instance uses only switches and no fan controllers
  * 1.6 - Retrigger fans immediately when the retrigger time elapses rather than waiting for the next sensor event
  * 1.6.1 - Fix an issue with 1.6 that caused fans to repeatedly turn on and off if they tripped their own motion sensor inside their retrigger interval
  * 1.7 - Add the thermostatOperatingState attribute to support the ThermostatOperatingState capability
